name: halfdan
description:
This was made for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 5.

Navigate your vessel through water that would prefer if you died. Acquire loosely implied slave labor to improve navigability. Finally, etch anything you want into the annals of history. Wait long enough, and even a hasty scribbling of a deer in a cave will be interesting to someone.

Credits to zapsplat.com for the audio. Every other asset was made by me.
